song.title: I Could Sing of Your Love Forever
song.lyrics:
[V] .G Em Over the mountains and the sea . C Your river runs with love for me . D and I will open up my heart . G and let the Healer set me free || . Em I'm happy to be in the truth . C and I will daily lift my hands . D for I will always sing of when . Your love came down
[C] .G D I could sing of Your love forever .Em C I could sing of Your love forever
[B] .Am G Oh, I feel like dancing - hey yeaah .Am G it's foolishness I know || .Am G but when the world has seen the light . C G they will dance with joy . C D like we're dancing now
song.presentation: V C V C B C
